Sir Francis Bacon his apologie in certaine imputations concerning the late Earle of Essex written to the Right Honourable his very good lord, the Earle of Devon-shire, lord livetenant [sic] of Ireland. Apologie in certaine imputations concerning the late Earl of Essex Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
[2], 19 p.
[s.n.], London : 1642.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
